snippet: Former Connecticut Governor John Rowland, who spent time in federal prison for corruption, was indicted on Thursday on charges of illegal campaign activities, authorities said....

headline.print_headline: Former Connecticut Governor Indicted on Campaign Charges
headline.main: Former Connecticut Governor Indicted on Campaign Charges

lead_paragraph: Former Connecticut Governor John Rowland, who spent time in federal prison for corruption, was indicted on Thursday on charges of illegal campaign activities, authorities said.
